title: Find Commits that Manipulated a Specific String
description: In this lab, you will learn how to use the Git version control system to find all the commits that modified a specific string in a file, which is a useful skill for debugging and tracking code changes.

meta.title: Git Playground | Version Control | Code History
meta.description: Learn how to use Git, a powerful version control system, to track changes made to your codebase over time and find all the commits that manipulated a specific string.
meta.keywords: Git, version control, code history, commit tracking, string manipulation

steps.title: Find Commits that Manipulated a Specific String

verify.name: Verify for successful view
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 查找操作特定字符串的提交

meta.title: Git实验场 | 版本控制 | 代码历史
